item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. TypeScript types can run DOOM [video] (223 points | 39 comments)
2. Launch HN: Maritime Fusion (YC W25) – Fusion Reactors for Ships (52 points | 49 comments)
3. Show HN: Tach – Visualize and untangle your Python codebase (37 points | 3 comments)
4. DARPA Large Bio-Mechanical Space Structures (35 points | 11 comments)

9. Long division verified via Hoare logic (23 points | 11 comments)
10. Bifurcation: The secret giant islands formed when rivers split (43 points | 6 comments)
11. ForeverVM: Run AI-generated code in stateful sandboxes that run forever (26 points | 4 comments)

20. Living in your programming environment [pdf] (15 points | 1 comment)

22. State of emergency declared after blackout plunges most of Chile into darkness (147 points | 134 comments)
23. Hyperspace (791 points | 411 comments)
24. Part two of Grant Sanderson's video with Terry Tao on the cosmic distance ladder (353 points | 72 comments)
25. Launch HN: Browser Use (YC W25) – open-source web agents (227 points | 88 comments)
26. The journalists training AI models for Meta and OpenAI (71 points | 25 comments)
27. Ggwave: Tiny Data-over-Sound Library (257 points | 62 comments)
28. A CLI to quickly launch VSCode/cursor devcontainers (36 points | 16 comments)
29. Iterated Log Coding (95 points | 29 comments)
30. Why are QR Codes with capital letters smaller than QR codes with lower case? (294 points | 87 comments)
